abstract: Inside Art column; Independent Art Fair organizers are excited about new home at Spring Studios, large flexible space overlooking St John's Park in TriBeCa, particularly since it can accommodate works which were difficult to showcase at former Chelsea location.
lead_paragraph: The fair is moving from its old Chelsea building into a space at Spring Studios that will allow more flexibility for different types of artists and projects.

headline.main: The Independent Art Fair Finds a Sleek Home in TriBeCa
headline.print_headline: Art Fair Finds a Home in a Sleek TriBeCa Space

snippet: The fair is moving from its old Chelsea building into a space at Spring Studios that will allow more flexibility for different types of artists and projects.
